com.mumfrey.liteloader.transformers.access

Class AccessorTransformer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mumfrey.liteloader.transformers.ClassTransformer
      • com.mumfrey.liteloader.transformers.access.AccessorTransformer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MinecraftTransformer

    public abstract class AccessorTransformer
extends ClassTransformer
    Transformer which can inject accessor methods defined by an annotated interface into a target class.
    Author:
    Adam Mummery-Smith
